channel.title: Nearlly finished My client just a few things to go (will pay if needed)
channel.description:
Right, I am using devine pk source 5.0v, i have done my router and i have done my no-ip forum, done everything basicly to make it work and stuff, but i just want to change the name of the client to my name of choice and add a few things to the client, ive added loads of items and objects but there are different things i will need help with, not really alot to be fair,
Another thing is i send my client to them, but they hav to change the 'setting.ini' to my ip all the time for them to log on, i am willing to pay through paypal if alot of work is needed, think i need a src in the client folder to edit the name of the client and the picture when going to log in.
my msn adress is : tha_bold_one@hotmail.co.uk feel free to add me if you know what i am going on about and are willing to help :D
thanks alot .damien

Right, I am using devine pk source 5.0v, i have done my router and i have done my no-ip forum, done everything basicly to make it work and stuff, but i just want to change the name of the client to my name of choice and add a few things to the client, ive added loads of items and objects but there are different things i will need help with, not really alot to be fair,
